channel.title: WinRAR being a gaylord
channel.description:
Okay I'm pretty sure WinRAR has turned into a homosexual.
Whenever i try to extract something it comes up with:
! C:\Users\*****\AppData\Local\Temp\Megaman Misadventures of Tron Bonne.rar: CRC failed in Megaman Misadventures of Tron Bonne\EBOOT.PBP. The file is corrupt ! C:\Users\*****\AppData\Local\Temp\Megaman Misadventures of Tron Bonne.rar: Unexpected end of archive
It's done this to loads of stuff recently and i uninstall led and got the newest version and it's just so homosexual! What am i doing so wrong that winrar hates me!

item.title: WinRAR being a gaylord
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

goatee:

No if i downloaded from megaupload or mediashare with firefox it would just say download finished after like a second then when i try to open it it turns out to be corrupted.

And you wouldnt think that would be a problem?

Read full topic

item.title: WinRAR being a gaylord
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

goatee:

Anyway say i have part 1.rar and part 2.rar , how can I merge them together with win rar?

I’m assuming you mean your downloading something in PARTS, that you have to join several files together, to make 1 file.

Try HJSplit.

Read full topic

item.title: WinRAR being a gaylord
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

goatee:

Fixed… i regret to inform you that firefox does not donwload them properly, IE downloaded fine. I feel let down lol.

I daresay Opera would download them properly. But are you sure the download actually finished before you tried extracting?

And about merging, I would do it manually.

Read full topic

Anyway say i have part 1.rar and part 2.rar , how can I merge them together with win rar?
